text: Ani to divasadekhila athavana karanyayogya ahe, jya divasi amhi tya sarvanna ekatra karu; maga aneka isvaranci bhakti- aradhana karanaryanna sangu ki tumhi ani tumace sahabhagi isvara apalya jagi thamba, maga amhi tyancyata apasata phuta padu ani tyance te sahabhagi mhanatila ki tumhi amaci upasana (puja) karita navhata
